artist: Painter: After Jan Meyssens; Engraver: Cornelis Meyssens
description: portrait, bust length of man turnedleft looking at viewer; wearing cloak with white lace collar; left hand on chest
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: 90  IEAN MEYSSENS / ( 3 lines in French about the sitter) / Ioan Meyssens pinxit.   Cornelis Meyssens  sculp. | on sheet in pencil:  2-63
title: Portrait of Jan Meyssens
